nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 15 is the fifteenth issue of the comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The comic was written by James Gilarte and Michael Moreci, illustrated by Mauricet and Arianna Florean, and released on October 31, 2018 by IDW Publishing. The backup story is part of the Flight of the Falcon publishing program.
When an emergency landing separates BB-8 from Poe Dameron, the astromech droid must make friends with the natives to repair their ship and return home to the Resistance.
